language.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the DS-MDK v5.24.2 Driver Installation Wizard
language.welcomeIntro:
This wizard installs device drivers for DS-MDK v5.24.2.
WARNING: As some drivers have not been certified, you may be prompted to continue the installation for each driver.
language.finishTitle: You have completed the DS-MDK v5.24.2 Driver Installation Wizard
